meanings.definition: The plural form of pronotum, the dorsal plate on the prothorax of an insect.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, we found several pronota on the backs of beetles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the pronota of insects to understand their anatomy better.
meanings.sent3: The pronota on the bugs looked like tiny shields protecting them.
meanings.sent4: The pronota stood out like miniature mountains on the insects' backs.
meanings.sent5: The shiny pronota shimmered under the sunlight, catching our attention.

meanings.definition: The plural form of pronotum, the dorsal plate on the prothorax of an insect.
meanings.sent1: During the nature walk, we spotted pronota on various insects.
meanings.sent2: The pronota of the beetles were distinctively patterned.
meanings.sent3: The pronota seemed like tiny rooftops on the bugs' bodies.
meanings.sent4: The pronota resembled protective shields, guarding the insects.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the colorful pronota of the beetles.
